context: If an individual consumes a significant amount of water, they will experience a state of hydration. Conversely, if excessive amounts of sugar are ingested, a sugar crash will ensue. query: Can we say at least one of the following must always be true? (a) she will feel hydrated and (b) she doesn't eat too much sugar
